properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
LIBYA.
DNC 09.
VESSEL, 80 PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED
AND ADRIFT IN VICINITY 31-26.00N 017-34.00E
AT 310716Z AUG. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO JRCC LIBYA,
PHONE: 2189 1034 9739, 2182 1444 9149,
2182 1717 3377, 2182 1444 9488,
FAX: 2182 1360 6868,
E-MAIL: SAR@ANS.CAA.GOV.LY,
LMRCC.1@MOD.GOV.LY, OR MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 3906 5908 4409, 390 6592 4145,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
